arguments.argument: { if instance_exists(boss_obj){ //判断boss_obj是否存在于房间中 percentage = boss_obj.nowmp/boss_obj.maxmp; //boss当前生命值百分比 draw_set_color(color_full); //设置绘制颜色为满血时候的颜色 draw_set_alpha(percentage); //设置绘制不透明度,生命值越高,不透明度越高 draw_rectangle(view_xview[0]+68,view_yview[0]+682,1+view_xview[0]+68+32*10*percentage,view_yview[0]+692,0); //用满血时候的颜色绘制血条 draw_set_color(color_empty); //设置绘制颜色为空血时候的颜色 draw_set_alpha(1-percentage); //设置绘制不透明度,生命值越低,不透明度越高 draw_rectangle(view_xview[0]+68,view_yview[0]+682,1+view_xview[0]+68+32*10*percentage,view_yview[0]+692,0); //用空血时候的颜色绘制血条 } draw_set_alpha(1); //还原正常绘制不透明度 draw_set_color(c_black); //还原正常绘制颜色 }
